attributes.action: Call a general election if Theresa May resigns or is removed as PM
attributes.additional_details: This government has constantly lost votes especially over Brexit, proving they no longer command a workable majority in the House of Commons.
attributes.background: This government cannot command a majority in the House of Commons, just changing the Prime Minister will not change this reality.  Given this undeniable fact, they must do the honourable thing and return to the people to elect a government with a majority that can.
